title: Frie tøyler
overview: In Frie Tøyler, viewers get to go inside the Norwegian galloping community, a fascinating world where strong personalities, lots of money, reputation and big dreams collide. The series is not only about fast horses and expensive competitions, but also provides a unique insight into the people who live and breathe the sport.This is a docu-reality that explores both the professional and personal lives of jockeys, trainers, horse owners, and the support system around the galloping sport. Through the season's six episodes, the audience gets up close and personal with their everyday lives, challenges, ups, downs, and the unique atmosphere that is created in their community.
